channel.title: Weapon timer Glitch?
channel.description:
So I've got a cammy pvp source and there is a glitch on there where if you hit with a 2h then click on your karils bow, eat and at the same time, It will cancel out the 2h weapon timer and hit as a kbow would hit, And cause to hit quick 50's and 40's. Just wanting to know if anybody had the intelligence to teach me how to fix this.
Thankss Please give me feedback!

item.title: Weapon timer Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Kushi_Stanky Kushi Stanky
item.description:
@Kushi_Stanky wrote:

So I’ve got a cammy pvp source and there is a glitch on there where if you hit with a 2h then click on your karils bow, eat and at the same time, It will cancel out the 2h weapon timer and hit as a kbow would hit, And cause to hit quick 50’s and 40’s. Just wanting to know if anybody had the intelligence to teach me how to fix this.
